meanings.sent1: We enjoyed the delicious food at the luaus.
meanings.sent2: The community organized a luau to celebrate the end of summer.
meanings.sent3: The luau had so much food, it felt like a never-ending feast!
meanings.sent4: The luau was a colorful celebration of Hawaiian culture.
meanings.sent5: The luaus were filled with laughter, music, and dancing under the stars.

meanings.definition: A gathering or celebration featuring Hawaiian food and entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The luaus always have amazing performances.
meanings.sent2: We attended a luau with traditional Hawaiian dishes.
meanings.sent3: At the luau, we danced to the lively music all night long.
meanings.sent4: The luau was a tropical paradise of flavors and fun.
meanings.sent5: The luaus transported us to the beautiful islands of Hawaii with their festive atmosphere.
